pred: The unique feature of PolyAI is the integration of multiple antibody genes in one polypeptide. This allows for the creation of a fusion protein that possesses the potential to overcome the merism problem. The merism problem refers to the phenomenon where the polypeptide fails to assemble properly after intravescular injection because the three-dimensional (3D) backbone of the polypeptide is not compatible with the 2D configuration of the injection site.
